pluginstrument.description:
Bezel overlay for G3000 and G5000 screens. Can be used as a G3000 or a buttonless G5000 unit.
Which unit type can be selected by the user property in the instrument configuration.
-- Mobiflight WASM module MUST be installed for G3000 functionality to work. To install it: -- 1. Download MobiFlight (https://www.mobiflight.com/en/download.html) -- 2. Go to Settings and enable the beta -- 3. Go to Help, check for updates -- 4. After the update, go to the MobiFlight folder (where MFConnector.exe is located) -- 5. Go inside the MSFS2020-module folder and copy the mobiflight-event-module folder to your community packages.
